SQLDriver Class Reference

Abstract base class for a SQL driver used together with SQLConnection and SQLQuery. More...

#include <SQLDriver.h>

Detailed Description

Abstract base class for a SQL driver used together with SQLConnection and SQLQuery.

Definition at line 25 of file SQLDriver.h.

virtual const void* SQLDriver::execute (  const char *  query  )  [pure virtual]
 

Sends the query to the server and get the result.

Parameters:
query Pointer to the (prepared) query string
Returns:

virtual const void* SQLDriver::nextRow (  const void *  result  )  [pure virtual]
 

Get the next row for a result.

Parameters:
result Result handle
Returns:
NUll if error, otherwise pointer to row handle, you have to call freeRow() for the returned pointer when you're done!

Implemented in WriteBlockableSQLDriver, MySQLDriver, and PostgreSQLDriver.

virtual bool SQLDriver::ping (   )  [pure virtual]
 

Check if the connection to the database is up, should do an automatic reconnect if its down.

Only call this if an earlier call to connect() has succeeded.

Returns:
true if its up or the reconnection succeeded, false if there's a problem

Implemented in WriteBlockableSQLDriver, MySQLDriver, MySQLReplDriver, and PostgreSQLDriver.

virtual const char* SQLDriver::prepare (  const char *  query  )  [pure virtual]
 

Prepare the query for use.

Parameters:
query The query string to prepare
Returns:
Pointer to prepared query or the pointer that was passed, if a new pointer was passed, you have to call freePrepared() later! This function returns NULL if something goes wrong.

Implemented in WriteBlockableSQLDriver, MySQLDriver, and PostgreSQLDriver.

virtual bool SQLDriver::rollbackTransaction (   )  [pure virtual]
 

Rollback a transaction.

Returns:
true if successfull

Implemented in WriteBlockableSQLDriver, MySQLDriver, and PostgreSQLDriver.

virtual bool SQLDriver::setMaster (  bool  master  )  [pure virtual]
 

Set "master" status of this driver, a master is allowed to perform changes in the backend such as changing master/slave replication states.

This is set to true for modules acting as leaders.

Parameters:
master The new master status
Returns:
true if successfull

Implemented in WriteBlockableSQLDriver, MySQLDriver, and PostgreSQLDriver.

virtual bool SQLDriver::tableExists (  const char *  tableName  )  [pure virtual]
 

Check if a certain table exists.

Parameters:
tableName Pointer to the table name
Returns:
true if it exists

Implemented in WriteBlockableSQLDriver, MySQLDriver, and PostgreSQLDriver.
